about_the_game:
A short TPS game.
The game is a free add-on for the base game.

How to play


You can select this game when you press "PLAY" on the STEAM application.

Features of this DLC game


​It's more difficult than a base game.
​It is necessary to open the door by operating the switch of the cave.
​A pico rifle can load four bullets.​
Pico's level doesn't increase.
​Her HP is too low to withstand enemy attacks.
​Pico can't fly.
​Pico can't use magic.
The atmosphere of a cave.
​Save/Load functionality is not available.

​About the Ridolfi Cave


​Ridolfi Cave is a cave in the Kingdom of Highland. ​
Stone Knights (created by human magic) live there.

​About Stone Knight


​Stone Knights are magical creatures created by magic.
​Stone Knights blow themselves up when they are damaged.

Operations


Move: W, A, S, D
Mouse wheel: Zooming in and out.
​Jump: Spacebar
​Run: Shift key
​Equip with a weapon: E key
​Weapon targeting: Hold down Right Mouse button
​Attack with a weapon: Left Mouse Click
Pause (Map, Character information, and Inventory): ESC key
Settings: Tab key
Melee Combat Mode: C key
Pico Punch: Right mouse button ( 0 damage )

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes the expression of firing weapons and firearms at people.
It does not include blood or Gore representations.
